entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low plus 1 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023
